page.title: 06A DAY IN THE LIFE OF MARIE
page.content: My name is Marie and I am fourteen years of age. I stay in the country, 3 miles from{Banchory.}I stay with my father, who is a director of his own building company, and my mother who works as a nurse at the local old folks home. We stay not far from{Crathes Castle} where I work as a waitress in the restaurant of the new{Visitors Centre} in the summer holidays and every weekend from{May}to{September.} Each Saturday morning I get up at about 10 o'clock, wash my hair and have breakfast of cornflakes, toast and tea. After breakfast I tidy my room and get dressed _ I have to wear a white blouse and black skirt. My mother takes me in the car to the castle in time for me to start work at 12 o'clock.
